tuv.seg: National Gallery of Ireland
Gailearaí Náisiúnta na hÉireann
The National Gallery of Ireland houses both the national collection of Irish art and the collection of European master paintings
Tá i nGailearaí Náisiúnta na hÉireann an bailiúchán náisiúnta d’ealaín na hÉireann agus an bailiúchán de phéintéireacht mháistirshaothair ealaíne na hEorpa
The painting collection spans the period from the 14th to the 20th centuries and includes all the major Continental schools
Tá sa bhailiúchán péintéireachta saothair ón tréimhse idir an 14ú agus an 20ú haois agus áirítear leis an uile phríomhscoil Mhór-Roinne
Irish painting is charted from its re-emergence in the 17th century through to the work of Jack B
Sonraítear péintéireacht na hÉireann óna hath-theacht chun cinn sa 17ú haois aniar go dtí saothar Jack B
Yeats, Ireland's most important 20th century artist
Yeats, an t-ealaíontóir ba thábhachtaí sa 20ú haois in Éirinn
The sculpture collection is dispersed throughout the painting galleries and ranges chiefly from the 17th to the 20th centuries
Tá an bailiúchán dealbhóireachta leagtha amach ar fud na ngailearaithe péintéireachta agus is ón 17ú go dtí an 20ú haois an chuid is mó de na saothair
Irish portrait busts make up the largest number of sculptures
Is iad bráidealbha portráide na hÉireann is mó atá ann i measc na dealbhóireachta
Prints, drawings and watercolours
Priontaí, tarraingtí agus uiscedhathanna
The National Gallery has a large collection of original prints by European and American artists, dating from the 17th to the 20th centuries
Tá ag an nGailearaí Náisiúnta bailiúchán mór de phriontaí bunúla de chuid ealaíontóirí Eorpacha agus Meiriceánacha, ón 17ú go dtí an 20ú haois
The drawings and watercolours collection includes most movements in European art from the 16th century to modern times
Cuimsítear sa bhailiúchán tarraingtí agus uiscedhathanna formhór ghluaiseachtaí ealaíne na hEorpa ón 16ú haois aniar go dtí an aimsir nua-aimseartha
The Gallery's library and archives
Leabharlann agus cartlann an Ghailearaí
The purpose of the Gallery's library and archives collection is to support the development and maintenance of the Gallery's collections through the provision of relevant reading material
Is é cuspóir bhailiúchán leabharlann agus chartlann an Ghailearaí tacú le forbairt agus le cothabháil bhailiúcháin an Ghailearaí tríd an ábhar cuí léimh a chur ar fáil
The library also serves as a national and international resource for the study of Irish art and as a national resource for the study of European art
Ina theannta sin, feidhmíonn an leabharlann mar acmhainní náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta do staidéar ealaín na hÉireann agus mar acmhainn náisiúnta do staidéar ealaín na hEorpa
Readers should specify their area of research when making an appointment so that access to the relevant materials can be provided
Ba cheart do léitheoirí a limistéar taighde a shonrú agus coinne á dhéanamh ionas gur féidir rochtain a chur ar fáil ar na hábhair chuí
The Gallery is open from 9.30am to 5.30pm, Monday to Saturday
Tá an Gailearaí ar oscailt idir 9.30r.n
It is open from 9.30am to 8.30pm on Thursday, from 12.00pm to 5.30pm on Sunday and from 10.00am to 5.30pm on public holidays
agus 5.30i.n., ó Luan go Satharn. Tá sé ar oscailt ó 9.30r.n. agus 8.30i.n. ar an Déardaoin, idir 12.00i.n. agus 5.30i.n
The Gallery is closed on Good Friday and on the 24, 25 and 26 December
Tá an Gailearaí dúnta Aoine an Chéasta agus idir an 24, 25 agus an 26 Nollaig
Entry to the various galleries and shop stops 15 minutes before the Gallery closes
Ní thugtar cead isteach chuig na gailearaithe éagsúla agus chuig an siopa 15 nóiméad sula ndúntar an Gailearaí
Facilities for disabled visitors
Áiseanna do chuairteoirí faoi mhíchumas
Public areas of the Gallery are accessible by lifts to all levels and wheelchairs are available on request for mobility impaired visitors
Tá limistéir phoiblí den Ghailearaí inrochtana ag ardaitheoirí chuig an uile leibhéal agus tá fáil ar chathaoireacha rothaí ar iarraidh do chuairteoirí maolghluaiste
Further information on accessability is available on the Gallery's website
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil ar inrochtaineacht ar láithreán gréasáin an Ghailearaí
The gallery provides a range of tours
Cuireann an Gailearaí réimsí turas ar fáil
Free public tours are available on Saturdays and Sundays
Tá fáil ar thurais phoiblí saor in aisce ar an Satharn agus ar an Domhnach
School tours and guided tours for private groups are also available
Ina theannta sin, tá fáil ar thurais do scoileanna agus ar thurais threoraithe do ghrúpaí príobháideacha
Guided tours must be booked for private groups, schools and university groups, special interest groups and individuals
Ní mór turais threoraithe a chur in áirithe do ghrúpaí príobháideacha, do scoileanna agus d’ollscoileanna, do ghrúpaí sainspéise agus do dhaoine aonair
Self guided tours must also be booked in advance
Ní mór turais fhéintreoraithe a chur in áirithe roimh ré freisin
A minimum of 2 weeks notice is required
Teastaíonn fógra 2 sheachtain ar a laghad
You can make a booking online
Is féidir leat turas a chur in áirithe ar líne
The Gallery's Education Department organises programmes and events for all age groups
Eagraíonn Rannóg Oideachais an Ghailearaí cláir agus imeachtaí don uile aoisghrúpa
Information for schools is available here
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéise do scoileanna anseo
Visitors are not allowed to touch the paintings, sculpture or furniture
Ní cheadaítear do chuairteoirí lámh a leagan ar na saothair phéintéireachta, dhealbhóireachta ná ar na troscáin
Visitors are not allowed to use cameras, video equipment and mobile phones
Ní cheadaítear do chuairteoirí ceamaraí, trealamh fístéipe ná gutháin phóca a úsáid
Smoking, eating and drinking in the Gallery are forbidden
Níl cead tobac a chaitheamh, bia a ithe ná deochanna a ól sa Ghailearaí
You should contact the Education Department if you want permission to sketch and paint
Ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Rannóg Oideachais más mian leat cead a fháil sceitseáil agus péinteáil a dhéanamh
Rooms can be subject to unavoidable short-term closure without notice
D’fhéadfadh seomraí bheith faoi réir dúnadh dosheachanta gearrthéarmach gan fhógra
Further information on rules for visitors is available here
Tá fáil ar thuilleadh faisnéise faoi rialacha do chuairteoirí anseo
Admission to the Gallery is free
Tá cead isteach chuig an nGailearaí saor in aisce
There is an admission charge for visiting temporary exhibitions
Tá táille isteach le híoc chun cuairt a thabhairt ar thaispeántais shealadacha
There is no charge for guided tours of the Gallery for school groups
Níl aon táille le híoc ar thurais threoraithe den Ghailearaí do ghrúpaí scoile
There is a charge for guided tours for private groups
Tá táille le híoc do thurais threoraithe do ghrúpaí príobháideacha
If you wish to arrange a tour of the Gallery, you should contact the Education Department, Tel: (01) 661 5133
Más mian leat turas den Ghailearaí a shocrú, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Rannóg Oideachais, Guthán: (01) 661 5133
You can also make a booking online
Is féidir leat turas a chur in áirithe ar líne chomh maith
